text: Mondher Kebaier (; born 2 April 1970) is a Tunisian football coach who is currently manager of Tunisia. ==Career== Formerly a player at hometown club CA Bizertin, Kebaier became manager of the club in 2000, following a spell at AS Djerba that began in 1998. Kebaier thus moved to AS Kasserine, before joining Étoile du Sahel for two spells, beginning in 2010. In 2013, Kebaier rejoined Bizertin, winning the 2013 Tunisian Cup. In 2014, Kebaier joined Club Africain, before moving to AS Marsa in the same year, departing in 2016. In 2016, Kebaier joined Espérance de Tunis as a youth coach, managing the club for a month at the start of 2018. In August 2019, Kebaier was appointed manager of Tunisia on a three-year contract, replacing the outgoing Alain Giresse. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:People from Bizerte Category:Tunisian footballers Category:Tunisian football managers Category:Association football defenders Category:CA Bizertin players Category:Étoile Sportive du Sahel managers Category:Club Africain football managers Category:Espérance Sportive de Tunis managers Category:Tunisia national football team managers
title: Mondher Kebaier
